marklogic.body: Yay! Coffee is still good for you in *other* ways (minus caffeine!). I moved on to teas and yerba mate, but recently just found a different, healthier way to drink coffee. Cold-Pressed coffee! You grind your own beans, soak them in Cold water for 36 hrs. and then drain Off the liquid - save the liquid in your fridge as your extract and throw out the grinds. When you want a cup of coffee, Heat some water, put in about 4-5 Tbsp. of extract and enjoy! This way, the acids & oils from the coffee beans don't get extracted like they do when you put them directly into hot water. Doing it this way, your body digests coffee as a *vegetable*!!! And no acidic stomach (if coffee did that to you - it does me.) I can send you the "recipe" if you want to try it. Kristen hamilkn@yahoo:disqus .com www.interlacingofalivingfractal.blogspot.com/
